trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the <see langword="Volume" /> property of a <see langword="Prosody" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores para a propriedade <see langword="Volume" /> de um objeto <see langword="Prosody" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically synthetic speech engine output volume as defined by the members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> correspond to a percent of the maximum possible output loudness.
trans-unit.target: Mecanismo de fala normalmente sintético saída volume conforme definido pelos membros de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> corresponde a uma porcentagem de intensidade o máximo possível de saída.

trans-unit.source: For instance Loud corresponds to approximately 80% of the maximum volume.
trans-unit.target: Para a instância em alta corresponde a aproximadamente 80% do volume máximo.

trans-unit.source: However, any specific synthetic speech engine implementations may choose how to render audio output for a given value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume.Loud>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, as implementações de mecanismo de fala sintético específica podem escolher como renderizar a saída de áudio para um determinado valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume.Loud>.

trans-unit.source: The current base volume setting for a custom synthetic speech engine is obtained as a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> value through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: A configuração atual de volume de base para um mecanismo de fala sintético personalizado é obtido como uma <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> valor por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume%2A> site fornecido para esse mecanismo.

trans-unit.source: Fine tuning and modulation of output volume is managed on the basis of particular <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects, using members of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> to set the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> property on instances of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> used in creating or modifying the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object for the instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Ajuste fino e modulação de volume de saída é gerenciada com base em particular <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objetos, usando membros de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ProsodyVolume> para definir o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> propriedade em instâncias do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Volume%2A> usado na criação ou modificação de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto para a instância do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Current default volume value, same as the value returned by the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> site supplied to that engine.
trans-unit.target: Valor de volume padrão atual, igual ao valor retornado pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.Volume" /> no site <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite" /> fornecido para esse mecanismo.
